nodes.bodyText: Why we need unixHomePath when using windows

quoting from the issue,

Generated value in the Ballerina.toml file looks like below.
"wso2/gateway" = { path = "C:\Users\ADMINI~1\toolkit\bin\../lib/gateway-balo/gateway-2019r3-java8-3.1.0.balo"}

Replacing the backslashes in the windows path with forward slashes fixed the issue. This should be corrected in below line

  
    
      product-microgateway/components/micro-gateway-cli/src/main/java/org/wso2/apimgt/gateway/cli/cmd/BuildCmd.java
    
    
         Line 277
      in
      4aa807b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           fileContent = fileContent.replace(CliConstants.MICROGW_HOME_PLACEHOLDER, CmdUtils.getCLIHome()); 
        
    
  



Ballerina get confused when windows style path is provided in ballerina.toml
